name: Jailemental 2.0
description:
Jailemental

Jailemental Is a game where you control two elementals, Fire and Water, who mirror each other's movements. They must solve puzzles and make potions to escape the lair of the evil alchemist that created them.

Created by Christoph Maureder, Júlia Eszter Magyar, Eyal Harris, and Bektur Musaev

University of Europe for Applied Sciences

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences. 

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai 

WiSe2022 // Game`n`Play
